mapper.insert: insert into fcomment(fc_content, m_no, f_no) values(#{fc_content}, #{m_no}, #{f_no})
mapper.select: SELECT fc.fc_no, fc.fc_content, DATE_FORMAT(fc.fc_rdate,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS fc_rdate, DATE_FORMAT(fc.fc_udate,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS fc_udate, fc.m_no, fc.f_no, m.nickname, m.email FROM fcomment AS fc JOIN member2 AS m ON fc.m_no = m.m_no WHERE f_no=#{f_no} order by fc.fc_no DESC LIMIT #{replyPageMaker.calcCount}, #{replyPageMaker.listCount}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fcomment WHERE f_no=#{f_no}
